message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I believe I can only pay $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective, $9,500 is still a bit below my ideal price. I'm willing to come down to $9,800 to show my good faith.  This would be a great deal for both of us.  Let's see if we can close this deal.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I've carefully considered it, and I believe I can agree to $9,600 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you and we can move forward with the purchase.
